All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adaptee
This is the Adaptee class which has loadmap and savemap functions for the conquest map type.
Adapter
Adapter class works as a bridge between the target and adaptee.
Advance
The Advance class represents a type of order issued by a player in the game.
AdvanceTest
This class tests the methods written in Advance order class.
AggresivePlayerStrategy
This is a class which creates orders from the AggresivePlayer according to his strategy.
Airlift
The Airlift class implements the Order interface and contains the execute method for processing airlift orders issued by a player.
AirliftTest
This class tests the methods written in Airlift order class.
AllTestTestSuite
This Class is the test suite, it calls all the tests of Project
BenevolentPlayerStrategy
 
Blockade
The Blockade class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
BlockadeTest
This class tests the methods written in Blockade order class.
Bomb
Bomb class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
BombTest
This class tests the methods written in Bomb order class.
CheaterPlayerStrategy
 
Continent
This is a model class for storing continent's information
ControllerTestTestSuite
This Class is the test suite, it calls all the tests of Controller package
Country
This class contains all info about countries
Deploy
The Deploy class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method.
DeployTest
This class tests the methods written in Deploy order class.
Edit
The Edit Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
EditTest
This class tests the methods written in Edit phase class.
ExecuteOrder
The ExecuteOrder Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
ExecuteOrderTest
This class tests the methods written in ExecuteOrder class.
Game
This is the starting point of the game.
GameEngine
The GameEngine Class Controls the Phases of Game There are 3 phases
GameModel
This Is the Model class for game it has reference of map and players, it assign armies according to warzone rules and add/remove player from the game
GameModelTest
This Class tests the methods of GameModel class
Gameover
The GameOver Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
HumanPlayerStrategy
This Strategy class belongs to the Human Player.
IssueOrder
The IssueOrder Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
IssueOrderTest
This class tests the methods written in IssueOrder class.
LogEntryBuffer
An extension of the Observable class, this class is used to log any changes in a file.
Logger
A concrete class implementing the Observer interface.
Map
This is a map model class which stores all the countries and continents of the map.
MapController
This is the controller class for maps of the game
MapControllerTest
This Class test the map controller
Negotiate
The Negotiate class implements the Order interface and is responsible for executing negotiation commands between players in the game.
NegotiateTest
This class tests the methods written in Negotiate order class.
Observable
An Observable class with methods to connect/disconnect with observers and notify them of any updates.
Observer
An Observer interface containing an update method, called when notified by an Observable.
Order
This class is a model for the orders given by the game players
OrderTestTestSuite
This Class is the test suite, it calls all the tests of order package
Phase
The phase class is abstract class whose duty is to implement all the command in game All the commands in game will be implementing by relevant phases by using methods of phase class
Player
This is a model class for the game players
PlayerController
This class adds players to the game and randomly assigns countries amongst players It also allocates armies to the players according to the WarZone rules Each player is asked to enter their orders in a round-robin fashion until their reinforcements are exhausted
Reinforcement
The Reinforcement Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
Startup
The Startup Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
StateTestTestSuite
This Class is the test suite, it calls all the tests of state package
Strategy
This is a parent class for the strategy pattern.
Target
This is the target class for the adapter pattern.
